body: I think it would be a good idea to make a cyber Monday discount or like double xp for next year. If you don't make a discount I can understand because black Friday is just a couple days before. So yeah I hope that someone takes this into consideration.
body_tagged: I think it would be a good idea to make a cyber Monday discount or like double xp for next year. If you don't make a discount I can understand because black Friday is just a couple days before. So yeah I hope that someone takes this into consideration.
title: Cyber Monday

replies.body: Wasn't the black friday discount enough?
replies.body_tagged: Wasn't the black friday discount enough?

replies.body: Not for me I was about to buy a emerald rank as a present for someone else and a diamodn rank for myself, and at that moment the sale stopped O.O that was really annoying, but I wont be buying it n ow as it is to expensive without the sale O.o 50 dollars that avicus has lost now.

replies.body: I understand you, if you weren't late you could've also used the discount. I see no reason for a server to have a discount right after their first discount, as this server needs money in order to stay alive.
